thag1.86:0.4_0: and someone presented him with clothes.
thag1.86:1.1_0: Elsewhere there are many other doctrines;
thag1.86:1.2_0: those paths don’t lead to quenching like this one does.
thag1.86:1.3_0: For the Buddha himself instructs the Saṅgha;
thag1.86:1.4_0: the Teacher shows the palms of his hands.
